titles.title: Impeaching Lloyd James Austin III, Secretary of Defense, for high crimes and misdemeanors.
Impeaching Lloyd James Austin III, Secretary of Defense, for high crimes and misdemeanors.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This resolution impeaches Secretary of Defense Lloyd Austin for high crimes and misdemeanors for failure to demolish or obstruct a Chinese high-altitude balloon flying over North American airspace from January 28-February 4, 2023.
